title: Elementalist Lux
body:
Apparently I no longer own elementalist lux, and when I click to use the skin it asks me to repurchase it. However I haven't refunded it etc; it just will not let me use it

I still own the icons just not the skin itself and I would like to know if this is a bug or not

replies.body: That sounds like a strange issue. Hit us up in a ticket so that we can look into your specific case individually. We'll  be able to clear things up.
